articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Defensives drive European shares higher before U.S.-China trade talks
articles.description: A bounce across defensive sectors propelled European shares higher on Tuesday, though trading was cautious before trade talks between the United States and China later in the week.

articles.author: Shinichi Saoshiro
articles.title: Global Markets: Asian stocks up on hopes trade tensions ease, Trump comments hit dollar
articles.description: Asian stocks rose on Tuesday, supported by hopes Beijing and Washington would dial back trade hostilities, though comments from the U.S. president about the yuan and Federal Reserve policy capped gains and weighed on the dollar.

articles.title: What is Novo Nordisk?
articles.description: Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company set up nearly a century ago with the aim of developing products to help those to diabetes.

articles.author: USA TODAY, USA TODAY
articles.title: Here comes Russia, back at it again with the hacking in time for midterms: Today's talker
articles.description: Microsoft reported new Russian hacking attempts targeting U.S. political groups ahead of midterm elections. But America has the power to retaliate.

articles.author: Nyshka Chandran
articles.title: Inspired by Malaysia, Singapore's political opposition parties look to work together
articles.description: Singapore's opposition parties have discussed combining their efforts, but it's not clear they've made any progress together.

articles.title: Video: Healthcare giant Novo Nordisk buys British bio-tech company
articles.description: Ziylo - which was created by Professor Anthony Davis, PhD student Harry Destecroix, and businessman Tom Smart - has been bought by Denmark-based Novo Nordisk. The deal for the spin-out firm could lead to the development of glucose-responsive insulin.

articles.author: Chriss W. Street
articles.title: California Legislature Kills Bill for Free Healthcare for Adult Illegal Aliens
articles.description: California Senate Bill 974, which would provide for “full-scope” Medi-Cal health benefits to all illegal aliens, died in the State Assembly after concerns about up to $3 billion in new costs.

articles.author: Penny Starr
articles.title: Ocasio-Cortez Sorry for Banning Press But ‘Sanctuary Space’ from Media Needed
articles.description: Socialist Democrat Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez defends banning the press because supporters may need a “sanctuary space” away from the media.

articles.author: Neil Munro
articles.title: Bloomberg: Tech-Giant Cisco Caught Discriminating Against American College-Grads
articles.description: The Department of Labor has concluded that Internet giant Cisco Systems has been discriminating against American college-graduates, according to a report by Bloomberg.
